text: Livain anabamɨn ikɨzibar gumazibara, kar borir iakɨnir vamɨran ikegha ghua, gumazir bar ghuribar tuziba, men dɨbobonim, 23,000plan gumaziba. Moses nguazitam abigha Livain anabamɨn adarazigh anɨngizir puvatɨ, mati a Israelian anabar igharazibagh amizɨ mokɨn. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a Livain anabamɨn gumaziba, Israelian anabar igharazibar gumaziba sara me mengezir puvatɨ.
